source.query: SELECT CurrencyRateID as currency_rate_id , cast(CurrencyRateDate as char) as currency_rate_date , FromCurrencyCode as from_currency_code , ToCurrencyCode as to_currency_code , AverageRate as average_rate , EndOfDayRate as end_of_day_rate , cast(ModifiedDate as char) as modified_date FROM currencyrate Where ModifiedDate > '${last_modified_date}'
